data.lyric:
[ti:If I Can't Have You]
[ar:Shawn Mendes]
[al:If I Can't Have You]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]If I Can't Have You - Shawn Mendes (肖恩·蒙德兹)
[00:01.21]Lyrics by：Shawn Mendes/Scott Harris/Teddy Geiger/Nate Mercereau
[00:02.43]Composed by：Shawn Mendes/Scott Harris/Teddy Geiger/Nate Mercereau
[00:03.65]I can't write one song that's not about you
[00:07.72]Can't drink without thinking about you
[00:11.60]Is it too late to tell you that
[00:15.03]Everything means nothing if I can't have you
[00:19.26]I'm in Toronto and I got this view
[00:22.34]But I might as well be in a hotel room
[00:26.18]Yeah it doesn't matter 'cause I'm so consumed
[00:30.02]Spending all my nights reading texts from you
[00:34.36]Oh I'm good at keeping my distance
[00:37.96]I know that you're the feeling I'm missing
[00:41.81]You know that I hate to admit it
[00:45.84]But everything means nothing if I can't have you
[00:49.86]I can't write one song that's not about you
[00:54.16]Can't drink without thinking about you
[00:58.03]Is it too late to tell you that
[01:01.45]Everything means nothing if I can't have you
[01:05.36]I can't write one song that's not about you
[01:09.57]Can't drink without thinking about you
[01:13.39]Is it too late to tell you that
[01:16.91]Everything means nothing if I can't have you
[01:21.17]I'm so sorry that my timing is off
[01:24.23]But I can't move on if we're still gonna talk
[01:29.00]Is it wrong for me to not want half
[01:31.91]I want all of you all the strings attached
[01:36.37]Oh I'm good at keeping my distance
[01:39.85]I know that you're the feeling I'm missing
[01:43.72]You know that I hate to admit it
[01:47.78]But everything means nothing if I can't have you
[01:51.85]I can't write one song that's not about you
[01:56.16]Can't drink without thinking about you
[01:59.95]Is it too late to tell you that
[02:03.34]Everything means nothing if I can't have you
[02:07.25]I can't write one song that's not about you
[02:11.54]Can't drink without thinking about you
[02:15.39]Is it too late to tell you that
[02:18.85]Everything means nothing if I can't have you
[02:22.91]I'm trying to move on forget you but I hold on
[02:26.78]Everything means nothing everything means nothing babe
[02:30.71]I'm trying to move on forget you but I hold on
[02:34.53]Everything means nothing if I can't have you
[02:38.39]I can't write one song that's not about you
[02:42.53]Can't drink without thinking about you
[02:46.41]Is it too late to tell you that
[02:49.88]Everything means nothing if I can't have you
[02:53.90]I can't write one song that's not about you
[02:57.99]Can't drink without thinking about you
[03:01.86]Is it too late to tell you that
[03:05.37]Everything means nothing if I can't have you
data.trans:
[ti:If I Can't Have You]
[ar:Shawn Mendes]
[al:If I Can't Have You]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.21]//
[00:02.43]//
[00:03.65]我写的每一首歌都是关于你
[00:07.72]喝酒的时候 脑子里都是你
[00:11.60]现在跟你说这些 会不会太晚了
[00:15.03]如果不能拥有你 一切都没意义
[00:19.26]我在多伦多 看着美丽的风景
[00:22.34]但我还不如待在酒店里
[00:26.18]无所谓了 反正我已经身心俱疲
[00:30.02]每天晚上 反复读着你发给我的短信
[00:34.36]我很擅长保持距离
[00:37.96]我知道我很想念你
[00:41.81]我不想承认
[00:45.84]但是如果没有你 一切都没意义
[00:49.86]我写的每一首歌都是关于你
[00:54.16]喝酒的时候 脑子里都是你
[00:58.03]现在跟你说这些 会不会太晚了
[01:01.45]如果不能拥有你 一切都没意义
[01:05.36]我写的每一首歌都是关于你
[01:09.57]喝酒的时候 脑子里都是你
[01:13.39]现在跟你说这些 会不会太晚了
[01:16.91]如果不能拥有你 一切都没意义
[01:21.17]真的很抱歉 我没有把握住机会
[01:24.23]但只要我们还有联系 我就无法忘记过去
[01:29.00]我不想要一半的你 这样不对吗
[01:31.91]我想要全部的你 毫无保留的你
[01:36.37]我很擅长保持距离
[01:39.85]我知道我很想念你
[01:43.72]我不想承认
[01:47.78]但是如果没有你 一切都没意义
[01:51.85]我写的每一首歌都是关于你
[01:56.16]喝酒的时候 脑子里都是你
[01:59.95]现在跟你说这些 会不会太晚了

[02:15.39]现在跟你说这些 会不会太晚了
[02:18.85]如果不能拥有你 一切都没意义
[02:22.91]我想要向前看 忘记你 但我寸步难行
[02:26.78]一切都没意义 一切都没意义 宝贝
[02:30.71]我想要向前看 忘记你 但我寸步难行

[02:46.41]现在跟你说这些 会不会太晚了
